help.description: Receives and monitors all CoE (CAN over Ethernet) packets from all sources.
help.ideal: Ideal for debugging, logging and monitoring all CoE traffic.
help.filterNode: Optional: Filter packets from a specific CAN node (0 = all)
help.filterType: Filter by data type: All, Analog only or Digital only
help.includeRaw: Add complete raw data to msg.payload.raw
